title: Asus ZenBook 13 hands-on: a big leap to small bezels
description: Asus apparently hates display bezel as much as we do, which is why its new 2018 ZenBooks have almost none. With a massively reduced footprint, the new 14-inch ZenBook is now smaller than the old 13-inch ZenBook, while the new ZenBook 13 is a tiny bijou of a laptop. With prices starting from $899, these are the affordable members of Asus' high-end laptop line.
